title: IDE Integration for Noted App

overview.description: Integrate Noted with popular IDEs and code editors to allow developers to create, view, and manage notes directly from their development environment
userNeed: Link notes to specific code files or projects
Quick capture of code snippets with context
Sync notes between IDE and Noted app

vscode.name: VS Code Extension
features: Sync with Noted app via Supabase

technicalApproach.authentication: OAuth or API key to connect IDE to user's Noted account
technicalApproach.dataSync: Use existing Supabase API for CRUD operations
technicalApproach.storage: Notes stored in Supabase (same as app)
technicalApproach.offline: Local cache in IDE, sync when online

challenges: Maintaining separate codebases for each IDE
Keeping extensions updated with app changes
notes: VS Code extension would reach widest audience
Consider API-first approach to support multiple IDEs
May be better as separate open-source project
